scripts.build-testing: NODE_ENV=production NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=testing next build && NODE_ENV=production NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=testing next export
scripts.build-staging: NODE_ENV=production NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=staging next build && NODE_ENV=production NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=staging next export
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=production next build && NODE_ENV=production NEXT_PUBLIC_APP_ENV=production next export
scripts.deploy-s3-testing-d1: aws s3 sync ./out s3://imarticus-20-staging-website --exclude 'downloads/*' && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3QBSVIUV7MC07 --paths '/*' --profile cfuser
scripts.deploy-s3-staging-d3: aws s3 sync ./out s3://imarticus-inhouse-staging-website-shadow --exclude 'downloads/*' && aws s3 sync s3://imarticus-inhouse-staging-website-shadow s3://imarticus-inhouse-staging-website --delete --exclude 'downloads/*' && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1YAAV7V8DAU75 --paths '/*' --profile cfuser
scripts.deploy-s3-staging-d2: aws s3 sync ./out s3://staging-imarticus-shadow-3 --exclude 'downloads/*' && aws s3 sync s3://staging-imarticus-shadow-3 s3://staging-imarticus-3 --delete --exclude 'downloads/*' && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E2CUALWXI1Y5JN --paths '/*' --profile cfuser
scripts.deploy-s3-production: aws s3 sync ./out s3://imarticus-gatsby-shadow --exclude 'downloads/*' && aws s3 sync s3://imarticus-gatsby-shadow s3://imarticus-gatsby --delete --exclude 'downloads/*' && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E1JIBB0MN2BJU4 --paths '/*' --profile cfuser
